title: Virginia Tech Athletics unveils Hokies Exchange platform - VT hokiesports.com
content: Virginia Tech Athletics unveils Hokies Exchange platform  VT hokiesports.com
description: Through its enhanced partnership with INFLCR, Virginia Tech Athletics is proud to announce another addition to its Name, Image and Likeness (NIL) efforts with Hokies Exchange. This complimentary service will offer a platform for student-athletes and businesses to interact and arrange a variety of NIL endorsement deals.
